name: Cat Rescue (Madison)
description:
Title: Cat Rescue

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: A witch named Lucy accidentally left the door to her tower open, causing her magical cats to escape all over the palace! Help her find them all.

Instructions: Press the UP key to start the game and jump between platforms. If the game ends, press ENTER to restart.

Game Design Team: Madison Prinzo – Game Designer
